originalText.text: Dr. Moreau is extremely kind, friendly, and thorough! If you are looking for an allergist- she is truly the best. We followed her from Brooklyn to Manhattan because she is amazing. Her new office at Latitude is more fitting than the Brooklyn location. It is clean, organized, they offer refreshments, and the entire staff has great communication and they were super patient with my child, who is special needs. Thank you, Dr. Moreau!

text.text: Dr. Moreau is extremely kind, friendly, and thorough! If you are looking for an allergist- she is truly the best. We followed her from Brooklyn to Manhattan because she is amazing. Her new office at Latitude is more fitting than the Brooklyn location. It is clean, organized, they offer refreshments, and the entire staff has great communication and they were super patient with my child, who is special needs. Thank you, Dr. Moreau!

originalText.text: I brought my one year old daughter to see Dr. Moreau for a suspected egg allergy. I was greated by Olivia in the office who was so kind & helpful. I then met Dr. Moreau who had such a fun & welcoming energy about her which put both my daughter & myself at ease. She listened, she was playful, she explained everything she was doing to my daughter as she was doing it & she was professional. I highly recommend bringing your child to see Dr. Moreau. You will be in great hands.

originalText.text: What an amazing doctor. Took my 4month old sons for allergy testing. She was thorough, knowledgeable but also super sweet and welcoming. The only downside was that they don’t do blood work for kids under the age of 2. Recommend her highly.

originalText.text: Dr. Moreau is amazing.  She is thorough, very knowledgeable and super sweet.  My kids love her and we highly recommend .

originalText.text: Dr. Moreau was great but it is impossible to make a follow up appointment as no one ever picks up the phone or returns your message.
